title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do         One of the many interpretive signs in the park sharing information about the multiple historic structures. NPS photo  The Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park is visited by over 5 million people every year!  Being 184.5 miles long, there are numerous places to start your visit and ways to enjoy the Park in every season! If you only have a few hours to enjoy the Park, start your visit at one of our Visitor Centers located up and down the Canal.    If you have an entire day add on one of the many activities you can enjoy along the towpath:   Hiking and Biking Camping Boating  Mobile Tour Ranger Led Program Canal Boat Ride Winter Activities Fishing Horseback Riding Walking Tours and other Informational Brochures
